title: Serene Foshan City Stay overlooking Wenhan Lake
description: Boasting calming lake views and sweeping urban vistas, Crowne Plaza Foshan Nanhai, an IHG Hotel, is a serene sanctuary in dynamic Foshan city - famous for its heritage Ming dynasty ceramics and as the origin place of Wing Chun-style kung fu. When you're not exploring the city's historical sights, temples and gardens, savour authentic Cantonese cuisine at Canal Luna and refresh yourself with a spa treatment before unwinding with a refined cocktail at the Lobby Lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Foshan Nanhai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 20 Huandao South Road, Nanhai District, Foshan 528000, China

title: China Foshan City Break with Outdoor Swimming Pool & Dim Sum Cafe
description: From Cantonese opera to ceramics and ancestral temples, Foshan is a treasure trove of discoveries, best explored from Crowne Plaza Foshan, an IHG Hotel. During your stay, be sure to start your day with mouthwatering dim sum, take a dip in the glorious outdoor swimming pool and watch chefs work their magic in the live cooking area at the Atrium Coffee Shop. There's no need to skip your daily workout routine thanks to a modern fitness centre onsite.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Foshan, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 118 Fenjiangzhong Road, Chancheng District, Foshan 528000, China

title: China: Foshan Five-Star Urban Stay with Calming Canal Views
description: With calming canal views and landscaped gardens, InterContinental Foshan, an IHG Hotel, is a serene sanctuary in the heart of the city. Discover destinations like the Ancestral Temple or Liang Garden, learn about the origins of Chinese kung fu or gaze out over tranquil Qiandeng Lake. On your return, savour authentic Cantonese cuisine at Canal Luna, indulge in a cocktail at Ole Ole Bar or enjoy a spa treatment at the soothing Lohas Spa.
offer_address: No.20 Denghu East Road, Nanhai District, Foshan, 528200, China

title: Elegant City Break Retreat with Sparkling Views of Foshan City
description: Explore the vibrant streets of China’s pottery and ceramics hub with a lavish stay at InterContinental Foshan Dongping, an IHG Hotel. Great for travellers wanting to experience the city like a local, Foshan is bursting with culture in the creative and martial arts scenes. Take a stroll through streets filled with classical Chinese architecture and discover why the city is praised as a foodie's paradise as you indulge in the local cuisine, then return to this luxurious hotel to experience ultimate relaxation.
location_description: Intercontinental Foshan Dongping, an IHG hotel
offer_address: 8 Wenhua South Road, Lecong, Shunde District, Foshan, 528300, Mainland China

title: Modern Foshan Hyatt Place Escape near CBD with Onsite Dining
description:
Uncover the rich cultural heritage and tranquil charm of Foshan from the comfort of a sophisticated retreat, ideally located in the quaint Lishui District. Break a sweat in the 24/7 fitness centre, grab your morning coffee at the Bar or swing by The Market for a flaky pastry or a sweet treat to fuel your day, perfect for business or leisure.

When you're ready to explore, find yourself moments from Foshan and Guangzhou’s CBDs. Wander through expansive, peaceful parks, tempt your tastebuds with authentic Cantonese dishes and signature local delicacies, or head to the Pearl River for a magical evening cruise beneath the sparkling city lights.
offer_address: 28 Lishui Avenue South, Lishui Town, Nanhai District, Foshan 528240, China
